backend/main.mo: Actor defining challenge, chat, recording, and user-profile logic with authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Report linking a cache‑busting rebuild feature to specific frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated 1–2 sentence summaries for many frontend files describing their roles.
frontend/.gitignore: Ignore rules for node modules, build outputs, env files, IDE files, logs, and caches.
frontend/index.css: Thin wrapper that re‑imports the main stylesheet from src/index.css.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry page with cache‑busting meta tags and placeholder for injected build version.
frontend/scripts/generateAppVersion.mjs: Build script generating a unique version string, writing it to .env.local and a generated TS module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component coordinating authentication, challenge status, navigation, URL sync, and version stamping.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing centered mobile container and invoking migration-banner suppression.
frontend/src/components/AppUpdatingNotic: Overlay notice shown during forced refresh when a version mismatch is detected.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentDetail: Component that renders multiline assignment text and bolds lines starting with step labels.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: Audio recording UI handling capture, playback, sharing, deletion, and upload state management.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/AuthIconButton.t: Icon-only authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with cache resets.
frontend/src/components/AutoInvitationRe: Automatically redeems persisted invitation codes and shows loading/error UI while updating related queries.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeChatTab: Chat interface for a challenge with message fetch, send, edit, reply, and auto-scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeDeleted: Popup dialog showing that a challenge was deleted with scrollable informational sections.
frontend/src/components/ChatReplyReferen: Displays a referenced chat message preview by fetching or finding it and resolving the sender name.
frontend/src/components/DevPanel.tsx: Optional developer panel showing auth info and offering state refresh tools.
frontend/src/components/InfoPopups.tsx: Renders trigger buttons and shared popups for informational sections like social contemplation and challenge details.
frontend/src/components/PopupBodySection: Renders sections with headings and text for popup bodies.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCompletio: Gate that requires users to complete their profile name before accessing the app content.
frontend/src/components/QueryStateGate.t: Wrapper component that handles loading, error, and success states for React Query results and renders children with fetched data.
frontend/src/components/RecordingLevelMe: Displays a colored audio level meter based on normalized input level with percentage output.
Audio player component that loads an audio URL, supports play/pause, seeking, and shows time progress.
frontend/src/components/SharedPopup.tsx: Reusable dialog wrapper providing consistent layout, scrolling, and trigger behavior using shadcn UI components.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Theme toggle button that switches between light and dark modes using a custom hook.
frontend/src/generated/appVersion.ts: Build‑generated file exposing a placeholder constant for the application version.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUpdateGuard.ts: Startup hook that checks app version mismatches and triggers a one‑time forced refresh with loop prevention.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecording.ts: Hook that manages audio recording, microphone access, level analysis, timers, and cleanup for recording sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPrincipal.ts: Hook that derives authentication status and principal string from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for handling Internet Identity login, stored identities, and related state and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks and key constants for fetching and mutating user profiles, challenge data, recordings, and chat messages via an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuppressMigrationB: Defines a hook that hides unwanted migration banners by scanning DOM nodes and using a MutationObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Implements a light/dark theme hook with localStorage persistence and system‑preference fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserChallengeStatu: Fetches the user's challenge status using React Query when authenticated and an actor is available.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Empty file placeholder for i18n setup.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nContext.tsx: Sets up a simple i18n context that provides English translations and enforces English/LTR document settings.
frontend/src/i18n/index.ts: Empty index file for i18n exports.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/en.json: Empty placeholder for English locale JSON.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/es.json: Empty placeholder for Spanish locale JSON.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains the English translation dictionary for the app with structured keys for UI text.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining design tokens, dark mode variables, and base/component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Renders the app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers applied.
Displays a placeholder UI for users with no active challenge, offering actions, recovery options, and translated text.
Large placeholder screen for challenge creation and management, handling invitation codes, participants, start time, and various challenge mutations.
frontend/src/screens/Screen5ManageChalle: Empty file placeholder for the challenge management screen.
UI placeholder showing challenge state info with an optional edit button and info popups.
Main in-challenge screen managing recordings, tabs, participant data, and URL state for daily assignments.
frontend/src/screens/UnifiedEntryMenu.ts: Unified entry screen determining navigation based on auth and challenge status with login and action buttons.
frontend/src/utils/appUrlState.ts: Utility for reading, writing, and clearing app navigation state via URL query parameters.
frontend/src/utils/appVersion.ts: Provides functions to read, validate, extract, and stamp the running app version from HTML meta tags.
frontend/src/utils/assignments.ts: Defines the fixed daily assignment set for the challenge with IDs, titles, and instructional content.
frontend/src/utils/backendBuildInfo.ts: Caches backend build info client-side and provides accessors plus a derived build identifier.
frontend/src/utils/challengeContext.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears the active challenge ID in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDayFormat.ts: Formats challenge day headers using start time and day index to produce readable dates.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDeletedNotic: Persists and manages a sessionStorage flag indicating a deleted-challenge notice.
frontend/src/utils/challengeRecovery.ts: Clears all client-side challenge state and invalidates related React Query caches.
frontend/src/utils/hardRefresh.ts: Performs cache‑busted hard refreshes with loop protection and utilities to try or clear refresh state.
frontend/src/utils/invitationCodes.ts: Generates random uppercase alphanumeric invitation codes without ambiguous characters.
frontend/src/utils/invitationLinks.ts: Builds, parses, persists, and clears challenge invitation URL parameters and sessionStorage state.
frontend/src/utils/recordingDayIndex.ts: Converts and validates UI and backend day indices for recording operations.
Logs upload attempts, failures, and successes with sanitized metadata and build/version info.
frontend/src/utils/recordingIds.ts: Defines canonical assignment IDs and provides helpers to validate, normalize, and assert them.
Extracts, classifies, and sanitizes error messages into safe, user‑friendly output.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/src/utils/versionCheck.ts: Checks the running app version against the latest deployed version by fetching fresh HTML and reports if a refresh is needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, known deployment cache issues, and the need for a rebuild to refresh the live environment.
